shortdesc.ph: After a media resource is successfully loaded, creates an instance of the PTMediaPlayerItem class to provide access to that resource.

conbody.p: The PTMediaPlayer resolves the media resource, loads the associated manifest file, and parses the manifest. This is the asynchronous part of the resource loading process. The PTMediaPlayerItem instance is produced after the resource has been resolved, and this instance is a resolved version of a media resource. provides access to the newly created PTMediaPlayerItem instance through PTMediaPlayer.currentItem.
conbody.note: You must wait for the resource to be successfully loaded before accessing the media player item.
